plot: The students at an all-girl college vote Colonel Stoopnagle and Budd as visiting lecturers over Albert Einstein and George Bernard Shaw, and the Board of Regents live to regret it.
title: The Inventors
plot_es: The students at an all-girl college vote Colonel Stoopnagle and Budd as visiting lecturers over Albert Einstein and George Bernard Shaw, and the Board of Regents live to regret it.
plot_en: The students at an all-girl college vote Colonel Stoopnagle and Budd as visiting lecturers over Albert Einstein and George Bernard Shaw, and the Board of Regents live to regret it.
